name: BLACKSTONE ADMINISTRATIVE SERVICES PARTNERSHIP L.P.
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to financial services and tax.
Issues related to maritime trade shipping.
Issues related to electric vehicles and vehicle charging.
Issues related to trade and USMCA.
Issues related to housing ownership, supply, and affordability.
Issues related to capital investment in health care services, service availability, and service quality.
Issues related to implementation of the Inflation Reduction Act (PL 117-169) and Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act (PL 117-58).
Issues related to financial services and tax; Issues related to tax incentives in the One Big Beautiful Bill Act (PL 119-21).
Issues related to energy tax incentives in the Inflation Reduction Act of 2022 (PL 117-169); Issues related to tax incentives in the One Big Beautiful Bill Act (PL 119-21).
Issues related to financial services, credit and investment policy.
